betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oFusion, but even more expensive!§r

Build the structure taking Fusion Glass in §aJEI§r.
To save on Fusion Casings, fit Input & Output Hatches wherever you can (as displayed in the structure).

The §aFusion Reactor Mk2§r is even more expensive than the Mk1! The key difference is that it has a higher §6Energy To Start§r than the Mk1, allowing you to run new recipes.

It can also overclock lower voltage recipes, such as those in the Mk1 reactor.

§6Fusion Reactor Overclocking§r works a bit differently compared to most machines. Instead of the traditional 4x power and 2x speed boost, the Fusion Reactor only does §a2x power for a 2x speed boost§r. You may be thinking this is the same as the LCR's perfect overclocking, but it's not. 
Remember how machines get one overclock for each voltage tier past the recipe's required tier? This means your §cZPM§r Fusion Reactor Mk2 will still only overclock §etwice§r with an §9IV§r recipe, meaning a total of 4x the power consumption for a 4x speed boost.
